Observations: There are two hills in this park. A small hill with a short run at the northwest end of the park and a larger hill on the southeast side of the park. Approved run is the west side, sledding towards the park. Both hills are unlit, parking available.
Small local man-made hill, very gradual slope, unlit, no parking available. Runs to the south and west have minimal obstructions.
Small local man-made hill used by residents and the adjacent school, parking provided. Fairly steep short slope with long clear landing run with no obstructions.
Large natural neighbourhood hill, gradual and steep slopes, no obstructions, long runs, no parking walk to park.
Very large multi-level natural hill, well bermed, gradual slopes and turns.
Small neighbourhood man-made hill, parking provided, unlit, gradual slope, long run with wide open area on the north side of the hill.
Medium neighbourhood natural hill, parking provided, unlit, medium slopes, wide open long runs.
Small neighbourhood man-made hill, parking provided, unlit, very gradual slope, open area, clear long run off with no obstructions.
Medium neighbourhood natural hill with gradual long run offs. Street parking avaialble, unlit.
Large natural hill, multi-levels and berms, street parking, unlit. Steep and gradual slopes with open spaces and clear long run off.
Medium neighbourhood man-made hill, street parking, unlit. Gradual slop with open spaces and clear long run off on the south side of the hill.

Park Name: Roy G. Hobbs Community Centre and Park
Observations: Small local man-made hill/berm, parking at the Centre, indirect lighting from the rink, gradual slope, long run with wide open area east of the Centre.
Medium neighbourhood natural hill, parking provided, unlit, medium slopes, wide open long runs.
Very large hill with long steep runs, parking provided a J. Alph Dulude Arena.  Hill lit at night. Commemoratively named in 1969.

Park Name: Queenswood Heights Centennial Park and Community Centre
Observations: Small local man-made berm/hill located around the baseball diamond, gradual slope, wide open run offs. South side of hill is the approved run.
Small local man-made hill, parking available, unlit, very gradual slope, wide open run off area.
Medium local man-made hill, wide open runs, parking provided, unlit, very gradual slope.
Small neighbourhood man-made hill.  Parking at Dovercourt CC. Medium length run, indirect lighting provided by the rink lights.
Large man-made hill in highly visible location.   Has lights, directional containment fencing, moderate slope to the hill, very long runs, parking available at Kanata Recreation Complex.
Small local natural hill at park entrance with a gradual slope with long run off. Parking provided, unlit.

Park Name: Wilfred Murray Park / R.J. Kennedy Community Hall and Arena
Observations: Small hill on the east side of the park using the snow removed from the rink, gradual slope no obstructions. To the north a small hill, gradual slope.
Small berm around soccer field, approved hill is at west side of park, gradual slope, unlit and no parking.
Small neighbourhood man-made hill with gradual slope, located beside the school. Indirect lihting from outdoor rink. Approved run is on the east side of the hill.
Small/medium neighbourhood man-made hill with long open runs, gradual slope, unlit, no parking
Located in east corner of park, medium neighbourhood natural hill, gradual slope, long run. Unlit, no parking.
Very large natural city-wide hill, multi-level slope, straight run, wide open run offs, parking provided, lighting, no obstructions, well bermed away from the Creek.
Small local man-made hill, gradual slope, parking provided at Fallingbrook CC. Approved run is on the west side of hill. Residual lighting from walking path.
Small man-made hill in south west part of park with gradual slope and open run off on approved run on west side of the hill. Residual lighting from outdoor rink. No parking available.
Small local man-made hill, wide open runs, no parking, unlit, very gradual slope.

Small neighbourhood man-made hill, gradual slope, unlit, parking provided at Southpointe Community building. Approved hill is located on south side of park to the east of main walking path with the approved run leading into the soccer field.
Very small local man-made hill, gradual slope, unlit, street parking. Approved run is on the west side of the hill.
Small/medium neighbourhood man-made hill, unlit, parking at the school, gradual slope, no obstacles, located beside a school.
Very small local man-made hill, parking at school, no obstructions, unlit.
Medium neighbourhood hill on east side of park, gradual slope, long clear runs, indirect lighting from the rink.
West hill gradual sloape ends near outdoor rink.  Residual lighting from outdoor rink. Street parking avaialble.
Small local hill, gradual slope, unlit, limited parking.
Small man-made hill, gradual slope to the south, no parking.
Large dry man-made storm water pond facility. Serves local community, unlit, no parking provided.   Gradual slope, wide open landing areas.

Park Name: Alfred Taylor Recreation Facility - North Gower
Observations: Medium neighbourhood man-made hill, parking provided, unlit, gradual slopes, long run area. Approved run is at south side of hill.
Small local man-made hill, gradual slope, clear runs with no obstructions and wide open run offs, parking provided.
Small local man-made hill, gradual slope, wide open run off, unlit, minimal parking at south end of park.
Large man-made hill, long run offs, residual lighting from street lights. Approved run is on north side of hill towards soccer field.
Small local hill, parking provided at Dempsey Community Centre, partially lit from the parking lot, gradual slopes, open run on the east section of the hill.
Medium neighbourhood natural hill, medium slopes,  open long runs on west side of hill. Unlit, no parking.
Small local man-made hill, gradual slopes with long open run off areas, indirect street lighting.

Large man-made hill at the east end of the football stadium with the approved slope, towards the Great Lawn, outlined with padding on either side. Gradual slope with open run off. Some lighting in park, and paid parking available underground.
Large steep hill with long run. The hill is situated closest to Sable Ridge Dr. and Quail Run. Unlit.
Small local man-made hill, gradual slope to the east,  unlit, no parking.
The hill is situated on the northeastt end of the park, near soccer field. Approved run is on south side of hill. Small hill with gradual slope, unlit, parking available.
Small hill unlit, no parking. Approved run is on south side of hill.

Dry pond storm water drainage bowl, gradual slope, wide open area, no parking, unlit.
Large local man-made berm. Limited parking off of Baseline. Gradual slope with a long run onto the playing field.
Large natural hill in north west of park with gradual long run off. Unlit with parking available.

Medium neighbourhood, man made hill, parking provided, unlit, medium slopes, wide open long run on east side of hill.
Located between play structure and soccer field, medium hill with gradual slope and long run off on the north side of the hill into the soccer field. Unlit hill, parking available.
Medium natural hill, access from path off of east end Wiggins Private. Unlit with minimal parking available at north end of park.
Small local hill with gradul slopes, minimal parking available at south end of park. Unlit, multiple gradual slopes at south and east ends of soccer field.
Small hill in east end of park, minimal parking, gradual slope, risidual lighting.
Very small hill in north-east corner of park with gradual slope. Unlit hill with no parking available.

Small/Medium hill with steep and steady slopes in north-east corner of park. Unlit hill with no parking available.
Two hills.  First hill is a medium steep hill toward soccer field.  Second hill is a large steep hill with a flat run in the middle.  No sledding on the East side.
Small natural hill with gradual slope and long run off. Located to the east of carp library and large parking lot. Unlit hill with parking available.
Small natural hill with gradual slope. Unlit hill and no parking available.
Medium local man-made hill, gradual slope, wide open runs on the north side of hill, unlit, parking available.
Medium neighbourhood man-made hill, gradual slope, clear open run offs, no parking provided, residual lighting from outdoor rink.

Two hills.  First hill is a medium steep hill toward soccer field.  Second hill is a large steep hill with a flat run in the middle.  No sledding on the East side.
